channel.title: Making my server look less like Runescape!Rep++
channel.description: Hey how can i make my server look and feel less like Runescape?Like,different graphics and stuff?Really need to know. Thanks guys.

item.title: Making my server look less like Runescape!Rep++
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

out of donations, thats to support the server because they like it obviously, if you are looking into something diffrent from runescape then make your own game or something. you cant really zone off runescape totally because your using a runescape base basically, its made for a runescape private server not pinball or something lmao.

Read full topic
